feature: Smart Watch Functions for ANDROID smartphones: Dial via watch GSM SIM(not included) or Bluetooth optional, Music play, Sedentary Reminder, Anti-lost(looking phone & looking smartwatch), Sleep Monitor, Pedometer, Voice Record, Bluetooth Watch Local&Remote Capture, Alarm, Calculator, Contact,Call history, Calendar. Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, Messages (have APP for Android and will get notifications in Smartwatch to read all messages from email and social media)

SmartWatch Functions for IOS IPHONE: Dial via watch SIM or Bluetooth optional, Music play, Sedentary Reminder, Sleep Monitor, Pedometer, Voice Record, Wrist Watch Local Capture, Alarm, Calculator, Contact, Call history, Calendar, Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, Messages.(have no APP for IOS, can not read Iphone's messages in Smartwatch)

Universal Compatibility：The smart watch works great with all smartphones by bluetooth.
